Public NotInheritable Class ButtonChrome Inherits Decorator
public ref class ButtonChrome sealed : System::Windows::Controls::Decorator

summary.span: 建立 .NET Framework 項目的佈景主題特定外觀。

span.span: Creates the theme-specific look for .NET Framework elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實際外觀相依於的佈景主題為作用中使用者的系統上。The actual appearance of the is dependent on which theme is active on the user's system. 此類別的屬性可讓.NET Framework 設定根據目前的佈景主題的外觀。The properties of this class allow the .NET Framework to set the appearance based on the current theme. 在 XAML 用法物件項目也可以有子內容，可以是單一設定屬性。In XAML usage, a object element can also have child content, which can be a single that sets the property. ## XAML 物件項目用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `theme:` Xmlns 前置詞CLR 命名空間。An xmlns prefix for the CLR namespace. 一般而言，xmlns 前置詞和對應的定義 （未顯示） 的 XAML 根項目。Typically, xmlns prefixes and mappings are defined in a XAML root element (not shown).

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 是否在表單上有預設按鈕的外觀。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the has the appearance of the default button on the form.

value.span: 如果 有預設按鈕的外觀，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the has the appearance of the default button; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設按鈕通常會有較暗的外框或其他視覺指標，顯示使用者會按一下哪一個按鈕，如果按下 Enter 鍵。The default button generally has a darker outer border or other visual indicator that shows the user which button will be clicked if the Enter key is pressed. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`| （不過，設定這個屬性可能不是所有的主題） (however, this property might not be set in all themes)|
